attributes.action: Abolish Warwickshire Constabulary and let West Midlands police take over the policeing of Warwickshire.
attributes.additional_details: Warwickshire Constabulary is too small to provide proper policeing of the county of  Warwickshire. The people of the county would receive a better more cost effective police service if the policeing of Warwickshire  was undertaken by West Midlands police.  Improvements in the justice system has already occurred as a result of the abolition of Warwickshire CPS. Their role being taken over by West Midlands CPS.
